html:
2021-12-06

------------------ E-COMMERCE - Mobile operator Play will offer e-commerce giant Amazon's service Amazon Prime to its postpaid clients at PLN 10.99 per month with first 30 days for free, Play said in a press statement.

Warsaw stocks are moving above the line, with the large-cap WIG20 index up by 0.35% to 2,187.36 pts at 16:01 local time.

------------------ E-COMMERCE - Mobile operator Play will offer e-commerce giant Amazon's service Amazon Prime to its postpaid clients at PLN 10.99 per month with first 30 days for free, Play said in a press statement.

The service includes free deliveries of select products regardless of order value plus access to online entertainment.

----------------- APATOR - Listed metering equipment producer Apator inked PLN 74.9 mln net in contracts for delivery of gas meters to gas distribution firm PSG, and has 24 months to supply the devices, Apator said in a market filing.

Under the deal, the total order volume may be upped or reduced by 20%, Apator said.
